settings.title: Sateen
settings.content: Feels like sliding into your favorite pair of pajamas
settings.item_4: MADE FROM 100% cotton or cotton / bamboo blend

settings.title: Percale
settings.content: Perfectly worn in and crisp like a tailored Oxford shirt

settings.title: Linen
settings.content: Breathable and lightweight, just like your go-to summer shirt

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "These ultra-soft bamboo flannel sheets keep me so warm and cozy, I (almost!) don’t need my heat on"

settings.title: Better Homes & Gardens
settings.content: "If you want the plush look and feel of a down pillow without compromising on structure or support, consider this one by Kassatex. It’s filled with lofty 650-fill-power European white goose down, giving it a “full, comfy, marshmallow-like feel,” according to our tester."

settings.title: Real Simple
settings.content: "Our top pick is the Kassatex European White Goose Down Pillow for its great balance of fluff and support"

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "Strengthened by its blend of eco-conscious materials, the luxurious Kyoto bamboo bath towel from Kassatex offers both the durability and lower carbon footprint of bamboo and the softness of cotton."

settings.title: Cosmopolitan
settings.content: "I am obsessed with these towels," one tester writes. "The softness, the absorbency, the texture. They are PERFECTION."

settings.title: The Strategist
settings.content: "Because you will certainly need to bring some wine with you from winery to picnic to hotel, do it with this three-bottle carrying tote I made with Kassatex." - Mia Moretti

settings.title: PureWow
settings.content: "Introducing Jennifer Fisher for Kassatex...From a slinky jacquard duvet and sham set to a cozy cuffed pajama top with piping details, every item carries an air of understated elegance that’s crisp, cozy and deliciously soft."

settings.title: Real Simple
settings.content: "We were immediately struck by how luxurious and soft the Kassatex towel felt. The minimalist block pattern is also nice, and it comes in five soft and neutral hues."

settings.title: The Spruce
settings.content: "Turkish cotton brings a level of luxuriousness to your average beach towel, and the Kassatex beach towel is the epitome of luxury."

settings.title: The Strategist
settings.content: "The bamboo in the Kassatex sheets offsets the slight crispness of linen, adding a smooth softness and making them drape over you like a gentle swaddle."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "Every time I climb into bed it’s like these sheets envelop me with silky, cooling goodness"

settings.title: Allure
settings.content: "If Goldilocks is your kindred spirit, this is the towel for you, because the Aegean cotton's medium-weight heft is not too heavy, and not too light: It's just right."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: “I’m not lying when I say these are the prettiest bath towels I’ve come across, ever... These are classic, luxe-looking, and can take your bathroom routine to the next level.”

settings.title: Better Homes & Gardens
settings.content: "Turkish towels are an extremely popular style of beach towel because of how absorbent, durable, and lightweight they can be, and the Kassatex Block Pareo beach towel is no exception."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "If you’re looking for a robe that’s exactly like one you’d find neatly folded in a luxe spa just waiting for you after a treatment, you should add to cart now."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "Right away, I could tell that the construction of the towels were something special. Made from 100 percent long-staple cotton, the towels are super plush and the fibers are quite dense. Kassatex definitely didn’t skimp on the details here."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: The Assisi towel by editor-fave linens brand Kassatex is not only striking, with white hanger loop stitches woven atop a subtle background color creating a unique pebble pattern, but it’s near indecently soft, too.

settings.title: Insider
settings.content: "Kassatex's Atelier Towels are the densest and most absorbent of all the towels we tried. They remain soft after several washes, and the hanging loops are a thoughtful touch. "

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "These durable towels have a minimalist look that blends into virtually any kitchen aesthetic, and they come in three chic colorways. They’re also pretty enough to leave out on the dinner table or next to your charcuterie spread."

settings.title: Shape
settings.content: "The different shape of this beach bag makes it really fun. While you might miss a top zip, the open-top on this straw beach bag will allow you to fit more in it."

settings.title: GQ
settings.content: The Kassatex linen sheets are actually a linen blend, made with 40% bamboo. If you aren't a blazing inferno of a sleeper, but still sleep on the warmer side, these sheets offer a good balance of breathability and coziness.

settings.title: Shape
settings.content: "This best beach towel style is airy and ideal to wrap around your body on those sticky, hot beachside evenings. It also folds very flat, making it a great piece to pack with you for a weekend getaway or fit into your stuffed suitcase for a tropical resort vacation."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "We're loving the reversible look of the Maui towels which is inspired by endless summer sunsets in Hawaii. One side of the towel features smooth velour while the other side is decked out in plush, absorbent terry."

settings.title: Domino
settings.content: "In Mia Moretti’s new collaboration with Kassatex, the DJ and author of Low Touch Economy, a collection of poems, designed a collection of woven wonders, from totes to baskets, that are all delightfully multipurpose."

settings.title: MyDomaine
settings.content: "I've been searching for a beach towel that's the perfect balance of oversized, soft, and thick, and Kassatex's Amalfi Beach Towel checks all the boxes."

settings.title: Thrillist
settings.content: "With these Kassatex Ibiza towels, you get the best of both worlds. Made from long-staple cotton, they’re a perfect compromise weightwise, and the chic stripes won’t fade in the wash thanks to the eco-melange dye, making them a favorite of hotels."

settings.title: Robb Report
settings.content: "All three sizes feature a waffle texture that enhances Turkish cotton’s natural absorption and drying ability, and the long-staple material used in them will feel soft and plush for a long time."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "I’ve been using the Kyoto towels for nearly three months, and they’re honestly the only ones I reach for now. Besides loving how they feel, I also appreciate their higher quality."

settings.title: Bloomberg
settings.content: "For those who can’t decide between terry and velour, the Maui beach towel from Kassatex offers the best of both worlds—terry on one side, velour on the other. Choose from a combination of gray and yellow or blue and orange."

settings.title: Business Insider
settings.content: "Kassatex's Atelier Towels are the most dense and absorbent of all the towels we tried. They remain soft after several washes, and the hanging loops are a thoughtful touch."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: “They are soft, airy, and lightweight... Unlike other linen sheets that can take a few washes to achieve a soft texture, these were soft from the moment I pulled them out of the package."

settings.title: Business Insider
settings.content: "When first moving out on their own, grads are going to need bath towels... The Kassatex Atelier is the top pick in our guide to the best bath towels because it's the most absorbent model our testers tried."

settings.title: Travel + Leisure
settings.content: "This beautiful cotton towel is lightweight, quick-drying, and will fit in any beach bag. We love the striped print and the fringe details on both ends."

settings.title: The Strategist
settings.content: “Very high-quality fabric, extremely comfortable, and easily washable, too.”

settings.title: Fast Company
settings.content: "For anyone who has seriously considered buying the hotel bathrobe: Kassatex’s white Turkish cotton terry robe is timeless and comes in three color options for contrast piping."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "Kassatex has been in business for over 20 years, so the brand knows a thing or two about making the perfect towel. With dozens (yes, dozens!) of styles and materials to choose from, Kassatex truly has a towel for everyone."

settings.title: The Daily Front Row
settings.content: "The East End’s most-wanted interior brand."

settings.title: Guest of a Guest
settings.content: "Veronica Beard and Kassatex have partnered to create the ultimate working-from-home summer statement piece - the Walter Blazer."

settings.title: Apartment Therapy
settings.content: "Kassatex’s sheets manage to be soft and substantial, combining all the best benefits of both linen and bamboo."

settings.title: GQ
settings.content: "The sheets are weightless and airy and seem to perfectly float over you."

settings.title: Vogue
settings.content: "And perhaps the icing on the cake was that all of these new wares from the New York–based brand—available in a slew of solid and striped colorways that can be easily mixed."

settings.subtitle: Shop The Farmer's Market Tote

settings.blockquote:
“Our passion for 
textiles is the driving force behind our success.  Our inspiration is our customers.”
settings.text_col_1: About Our Brand Founded in 1999, Kassatex was created with the vision of providing consumers with bed and bath collections that offer casual, affordable luxury. With headquarters located in the heart of Manhattan's Garment District, Kassatex is surrounded by the latest trends set against a backdrop of timeless, classic New York style. This unique mix influences everything we do in our collections. Like New York, Kassatex is modern with old world values. We are committed to helping our customers make a statement by escaping the ordinary.
settings.text_col_2: Excellence in luxury and superior comfort for the home is the heart and soul of Kassatex. We invite you to indulge in the sensual and the exceptional, with products and accessories of unparalleled quality for your bed and bath. We only use the finest yarns, including a selection of products that are environmentally friendly, while altogether providing a touch of elegance for the ultimate experience in home comfort. Social Responsibility We are proud to partner with The Red Cross and their affiliate partners to support the victims of natural disasters. The products that are returned are donated to the families in need of essential items like bedding and towels. Our hope is that this sends a sense of comfort and home that is lost when their lives are altered.

settings.title:
In New York?
We're Here Too!
settings.subtitle: Shop with our design experts.

settings.title: Percale
settings.description: Our eucalyptus percale blends Tencel Lyocell fibers with cotton for an incredibly soft feel that absorbs moisture to keep you cool. Maybe that's why its our #1 best seller.

settings.title: Sateen
settings.description: A unique combination of rayon from bamboo and long staple cotton fibers that produces a soft, extremely lustrous feel. Our sateen is silky to the touch with a slight sheen.

settings.title: Linen
settings.description: A proprietary blend combining all the things you love about linen along with the benefits of a bamboo blend, making it softer than cotton, super absorbent and naturally antimicrobial.

settings.title: Innovation & Design
settings.description: Each of our textile mills is Oeko-Tex Certified, which means our fabrics are guaranteed free of harmful chemicals. We push for the highest standards in social compliance and maintain the most environmentally friendly, sustainable practices available. Because we've been in business for over three generations, our family has long lasting relationships with specialized fabric mills worldwide, ensuring the best product is made by us and delivered to you.

settings.title: Our guarantee
settings.subtitle: 60-day Trial
settings.description: Because we believe in the unparalleled quality of our bedding and its superior comfort and style, we offer a 60-day no questions asked return policy on all of our bedding collections. We know you'll love sleeping in our sheets as much as we love making them.

settings.detail: Welcome to our world of fine linens and stylish home decor.

settings.description: Relive your past life full of late nights. Grab a bottle, bucket of ice, tray of snacks, and turn your living room into your former nightclub haunt.

settings.title: Our favorite couples and how they celebrate
What Our Customers Have to Say

Going Home and
Giving Back
settings.description: Born in Colombia, our founders believe in giving back to a community close to their hearts. By handcrafting these bags from the country's native fique plant, we are proud to preserve an old-world technique while providing financial security for 40 female heads of household.

settings.title: From Our Blog
settings.description: Oleema and Kalani Miller of Mikoh swimwear show us around Hawaii with our Rosario beach bag in tow.

settings.title: “The Go-Everywhere Tote”
settings.detail: Lightweight and packable but built to last-finally, fashion meets function in an essential summer beach bag.

settings.title: The Go-Everywhere Tote
settings.detail: Lightweight and packable but built to last — fashion meets function in an essential summer beach bag.

settings.title: What Our Customers Have to Say
Just A Splash
settings.description: From tongue-in-cheek velour beach towels to a terry blazer that can be monogrammed in gold embroidery and leopard-printed terry accessories, the Veronica Beard x Kassatex capsule collection celebrates one-of-a-kind summer style.

For their limited edition collection with Kassatex, designers Veronica Swanson Beard and Veronica Miele Beard found inspiration in the extreme summer fashion from the 1987 film Overboard, starring Goldie Hawn.

The designers had fun putting together their vision of the ultimate summer pieces from towel to turban, but it's the toweling blazer that has the pair most excited for vacation dressing. "The terry blazer coverup is the babe at the beach piece you need this summer!" says Veronica Swanson Beard. We think Goldie Hawn's character, Joanna Stayton, would agree.

"Working with the Veronicas was an incredible opportunity for us to create a fun collection that brought out a different sensibility and playfulness for Kassatex. And what could be better than a leopard terry turban and channeling your inner Goldie Hawn? Nothing!" says Alexandra Khoudari of Kassatex.

settings.title: The Launch Event
settings.detail: Veronica Miele Beard, Veronica Swanson Beard, and our very own Ernesto and Alexandra Khoudari hosted a lunch at 1Hotel Brooklyn Bridge to kick off the launch of Veronica Beard x Kassatex.

settings.title: The Launch Event
settings.detail: Veronica Miele Beard, Veronica Swanson Beard, and our very own Ernesto and Alexandra Khoudari hosted a lunch at 1Hotel Brooklyn Bridge to kick off the launch of Veronica Beard x Kassatex.

settings.description: We teamed up with Chairish to bring you a collection made from our signature materials, designed in Chairish-inspired colors and whimsical design details.

settings.title: The Towel Bundle
